GROUPS.creator: Judson Belmont
GROUPS.NOTE: Fields that must be defined in config XML. All ports, IPs, and passwords have been changed to protect the innocent, so this config file will NOT work as written in the Salomon pipeline

GROUP.NAME: global
GROUP.PARAM: This is the IP address or hostname of the computer running autoSearch.exe
listening port number
where to store search files on this computer?
where are the sequest param files on sequest?
where is the SEQUEST(R) executable?
where is the mascot daemon watch folder on this computer?
where is the extract_msn for extracting thermo raw files?
extract_msn parameters for high mass accuracy data
extract_msn parameters for low mass accuracy data
shared net location for sequest parameters folder
shared net location for mascot parameters folder
shared net location for mascot results folders
mascot search login name
mascot search login password
shared folder that backups raw data from this client on backup server
shared folder that backups search results from this client on backup server
This is the IP address or hostname of the computer running autoLoad.exe
listening port
where to store incoming files on this computer?
Status folder, no tailing slash!
temporary folder during execution. no tailing slash!
prefiltering. xcorr cutoff for +1, +2, +3_and_higher, respectively
prefiltering. mascot ion score (MOWSE score) cutoff for all charge state
base folder of spectral score main program
path of program to open raw file
smtp server to send email
sender's mail address
sender's name
Peptide Depot filemaker database server address
Peptide Depot filemaker database server port, default 2399
Peptide Depot filemaker database server username
Peptide Depot filemaker database server password
Peptide Depot filemaker database name. escape char: space->%20
Peptide Depot MySQL database server
Peptide Depot MySQL database server port, default 3306
Peptide Depot MySQL database server username
Peptide Depot MySQL database server password
Peptide Depot MySQL database name

toggle, use build-in zip or use winzip program? if this param is set to 'true', then the following .WinzipLocation param must be specified accordingly. this param is usually set to false unless your raw file size is larger than 500M

toggle, use build-in zip or use winzip program? if this param is set to 'true', then the following .WinzipLocation param must be specified accordingly. this param is usually set to false unless your raw file size is larger than 500M
winzip location
winzip location
jmb added path to 7zip
jmb added path to 7zip
----deprecated---- loader's shared net location for incoming data

GROUP.NAME: identity
GROUP.PARAM: four-letter code (a-zA-Z0-9_). This variable reflects the identity of clinet computer that initiates database search. If you have multiple computers submitting raw file, set this value accordingly and individually. (This variable must have the same value as client's TAG variable that you will see soon.)

GROUP.NAME: client
GROUP.PARAM: client's UNIQUE identity, as set previously

when printing and saving sequence files, this is the location where those files go
